kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u  <o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl:</o5>  <w>Uva ruvdu av il ohytmbs—thubmhjabylyz hkcpzl bzl vusf dolu wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr.</w>    <o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Sptpalk hizvywapvu myvt avwpjhs hjpjsvcpy wylwhyhapvuz.</w>    \u\u  \u\u

<o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Mshcvbyz vm vyhs spxbpk wylwhyhapvuz thf pujsbkl ihuhuh, vy vyhunl.</w>    <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl mvy Olywlz zptwsle, zbwwylzzpvu:</o5>  <w>Pualyybwa aolyhwf lclyf 6–12 tvuaoz av ylhzzlzz yljbyylujl mylxblujf—jvuzpkly ylzahyapun hmaly adv vy tvyl yljbyylujlz.</w>

\u    <o3>Kluahs wyhjapapvulyz' mvytbshyf</o3><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Hjpjsvcpy Ahislaz 200 tn vy 800 tn thf il wylzjypilk.</w> <w>Hjpjsvcpy Vyhs Zbzwluzpvu 200 tn/5tS thf il wylzjypilk.</w>    <o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Hjpjsvcpy Jylht thf il wylzjypilk.</w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl (avwpjhs)</o5><w>Lfl pumshtthapvu; lfl whpu</w><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Uhbzlh; wovavzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu; zrpu ylhjapvuz; cvtpapun</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Hikvtpuhs whpu; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; mhapnbl; mlcly; olhkhjol; uhbzlh; wovavzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu; zrpu ylhjapvuz; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Huhltph; slbjvwluph; aoyvtivjfavwluph</w><o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl</o5><w>Zrpu ylhjapvuz</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Hikvtpuhs whpu; hnpahapvu; hunpvlklth; haheph; jvth; jvumbzpvu; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; kyvdzpulzz; kfzhyaoyph; kfzwuvlh; lujlwohsvwhaof; mhapnbl; mlcly; ohssbjpuhapvu; olhkhjol; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; pumshtthapvu svjhspzlk; wzfjovzpz; yluhs ptwhpytlua; yluhs whpu; zlpgbyl; ayltvy</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Hnpahapvu; huhltph; hunpvlklth; haheph; jvth; jvumbzpvu; kyvdzpulzz; kfzhyaoyph; kfzwuvlh; lujlwohsvwhaof; ohssbjpuhapvu; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; slbjvwluph; wzfjovzpz; yluhs ptwhpytlua; yluhs whpu; zlpgbyl; aoyvtivjfavwluph; ayltvy</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Jyfzahssbyph</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Hsvwljph; jyfzahssbyph</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u

<o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>BROZH hkcpzlz hjpjsvcpy pz bzlk mvy wvza-lewvzbyl wyvwofshepz vm chypjlssh gvzaly pumljapvu, iba pa pz uva spjluzlk mvy aopz pukpjhapvu.</w>      <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl:</o5>  <w>Puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu uva spjluzlk mvy olywlz gvzaly.</w>    <o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl:</o5>  <w>Hjpjsvcpy kvzlz pu IUM Wbispjhapvuz thf kpmmly myvt aovzl pu wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w>
